mapper.insert: insert into shopping_notice(notice_idx, notice_title, notice_content, notice_date) values(#{notice_idx}, #{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select notice_idx, notice_title, notice_content, notice_date from shopping_notice where notice_idx = #{notice_idx}
select notice_idx, notice_title, notice_content, notice_date from shopping_notice order by notice_idx desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}

select * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM as RN, A.* FROM( select * from shopping_notice
WHERE notice_title LIKE concat('%' || #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE notice_content LIKE concat('%' || #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE notice_title LIKE concat('%' || #{keyword}, '%') or notice_content LIKE concat('%' || #{keyword}, '%')
order by notice_idx desc) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{displayPost}+ #{postNum}) WHERE RN > #{displayPost}

select count(*) from shopping_notice
WHERE notice_title LIKE concat('%' || #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE notice_content LIKE concat('%' || #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE notice_title LIKE concat('%' || #{keyword}, '%') or notice_content LIKE concat('%' || #{keyword}, '%')
